objective.title: Goal
objective.text: Move all cards to the 4 foundation piles (top right), sorted by suit from Ace to King.

howTo.title: How to Play
steps: Tap stock pile (top left) to draw cards
Drag cards to build descending sequences with alternating colors
Kings go on empty tableau spaces
Move Aces to foundations first, then build up by suit

scoring.title: Scoring
points: +10 points for each card to foundation

tips.title: Quick Tips
list: Always move Aces and 2s to foundations

objective.title: Goal
objective.text: Combine tiles with the same number to reach the 2048 tile!

howTo.title: How to Play
steps: Swipe (or use arrow keys) to move tiles in any direction
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one
After each move, a new tile (2 or 4) appears on the board
Keep combining tiles to reach higher numbers

scoring.title: Scoring
points: Each merged tile adds its value to your score
Try to beat your best score!

tips.title: Quick Tips
list: Keep your highest tile in a corner
Build tiles in one direction (e.g., always swipe left/down)
Don't make random moves - plan ahead
Try to keep the board organized

objective.title: Goal
objective.text: Find all matching pairs of cards to win the game!

howTo.title: How to Play
steps: Click any card to flip it face up
Click a second card to try to find its match
If the cards match, they stay face up
If they don't match, they flip back face down

scoring.title: Scoring
points: Time bonus: faster completion = more points
Move bonus: fewer moves = higher score
Try to complete in fewest moves!

tips.title: Quick Tips
list: Fewer moves means a better score
Take your time - accuracy over speed
